main.docTitle: Water Pollution Control (Port Shelter Water Control Zone) Order

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This Order may be cited as the Water Pollution Control (Port Shelter Water Control Zone) Order.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Declaration of Port Shelter Water Control Zone
section.content: The part of Hong Kong more particularly described in the Schedule is declared to be a water control zone, and is to be known as the Port Shelter Water Control Zone.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Designation of Authority
section.content: The Director of Environmental Protection is designated to be the Authority for the Port Shelter Water Control Zone and as such, subject to section 4(3) of the Water Pollution Control Ordinance (Cap. 358), to exercise and perform in respect of that zone, the functions, powers and duties conferred on the Authority by the Water Pollution Control Ordinance (Cap. 358).

schedule.name: sch0
schedule.content: The area bounded by a grey edging, including the area shaded grey, on a 1:25 000 map marked PSWCZ, signed by the Secretary for Lands and Works on 6 July 1989, and deposited in the Land Registry.
